question:
With reference to the talks to launch the ‘Train the Trainer’ program, consider the following statements:
  1. The program will provide training in Artificial Intelligence.
  2. The training will be imparted through distance education mode.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Skill India and IBM had signed an agreement to launch the ‘Train the Trainer’ program. This will impart training to ITI trainers in AI. The program will last a year and will enable greater spread of the skill set. Statement 2 is incorrect: The training will be provided at National Skill Training Institutes and Industrial Training Institutes across India. The participants will be pre-evaluated and then trained in 2 phases. It will involve an online component to provide holistic coverage. Post-training evaluations will also be conducted.
